main.name: Cyberpunk 2077
main.platform: PC, PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X
main.smallDesc: Cyberpunk 2077 is an open-world, action-adventure story set in Night City, a megalopolis obsessed with power, glamour and body modification. You play as V, a mercenary outlaw going after a one-of-a-kind implant that is the key to immortality.

main.name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
main.platform: PC, PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X
main.smallDesc: Assassin's Creed Valhalla is an open-world action-adventure game set in the Viking Age. You play as Eivor, a Viking raider, as you lead your clan from the harsh shores of Norway to a new home amid the lush farmlands of ninth-century England.

main.name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
main.platform: PC, PS4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
main.smallDesc: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt is a story-driven, open-world RPG set in a visually stunning fantasy universe. You play as Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter known as a Witcher, tasked with finding a child of prophecy in a vast open world rich with merchant cities, pirate islands, dangerous mountain passes, and forgotten caverns to explore.

main.name: Game 4
main.smallDesc: Game 4 is an exciting new game with immersive gameplay and stunning graphics.

main.name: Game 5
main.smallDesc: Game 5 is a thrilling action game with intense battles and challenging missions.

features.name: Cyberpunk 2077
features.platform: PC, PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X
features.smallDesc: Cyberpunk 2077 is an open-world, action-adventure story set in Night City, a megalopolis obsessed with power, glamour and body modification. You play as V, a mercenary outlaw going after a one-of-a-kind implant that is the key to immortality.

features.name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
features.platform: PC, PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X
features.smallDesc: Assassin's Creed Valhalla is an open-world action-adventure game set in the Viking Age. You play as Eivor, a Viking raider, as you lead your clan from the harsh shores of Norway to a new home amid the lush farmlands of ninth-century England.

features.name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
features.platform: PC, PS4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
features.smallDesc: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt is a story-driven, open-world RPG set in a visually stunning fantasy universe. You play as Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter known as a Witcher, tasked with finding a child of prophecy in a vast open world rich with merchant cities, pirate islands, dangerous mountain passes, and forgotten caverns to explore.

features.name: Red Dead Redemption 2
features.smallDesc: Red Dead Redemption 2 is an epic tale of life in Americaâ€™s unforgiving heartland. You play as Arthur Morgan, a member of the Van der Linde gang, as you navigate the vast and rugged landscapes of the American frontier in a quest to survive and find redemption.

features.name: The Last of Us Part II
features.smallDesc: The Last of Us Part II is an action-adventure game set in a post-apocalyptic world. You play as Ellie, a teenage girl, as she embarks on a quest for revenge in a world devastated by a deadly pandemic.

features.name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare
features.smallDesc: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare is a first-person shooter game that takes place in a realistic and modern setting. You play as various characters in a gripping single-player campaign and engage in intense multiplayer battles.

features.name: FIFA 21
features.platform: PC, PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X
features.smallDesc: FIFA 21 is a football simulation game that allows you to experience the thrill of professional football. You can play as your favorite teams and players in various game modes, including career mode, ultimate team, and online multiplayer.

features.name: Minecraft
features.platform: PC, PS4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
features.smallDesc: Minecraft is a sandbox game that allows you to build and explore virtual worlds made up of blocks. You can play in creative mode with unlimited resources or survive the dangerous nights in survival mode.

features.name: Grand Theft Auto V
features.smallDesc: Grand Theft Auto V is an open-world action-adventure game set in the fictional city of Los Santos. You play as three protagonists, Michael, Franklin, and Trevor, as they navigate the criminal underworld and carry out heists.

features.name: Among Us
features.smallDesc: Among Us is a multiplayer party game where you work together to find the impostor among the crew members. The impostor's goal is to eliminate the crew members without being caught.

features.name: Overwatch
features.platform: PC, PS4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
features.smallDesc: Overwatch is a team-based multiplayer first-person shooter game. You play as one of the heroes with unique abilities and work together with your team to complete objectives and defeat the opposing team.

features.name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
features.smallDesc: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild is an action-adventure game set in an open world. You play as Link, the hero of Hyrule, as you explore the vast kingdom, solve puzzles, and battle against enemies to rescue Princess Zelda and defeat the evil Calamity Ganon.

features.name: Fortnite
features.platform: PC, PS4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, iOS, Android
features.smallDesc: Fortnite is a free-to-play battle royale game where you compete against other players to be the last one standing. You can also build structures and use various weapons and items to gain an advantage.

features.name: Super Mario Odyssey
features.smallDesc: Super Mario Odyssey is a platform game where you control Mario as he embarks on a globe-trotting adventure to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser's wedding plans. You can explore various kingdoms and use Mario's new abilities to collect Power Moons and save the day.

features.name: PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds
features.platform: PC, PS4, Xbox One, iOS, Android
features.smallDesc: PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds is a battle royale game where you fight against other players to be the last one standing. You start with nothing and must scavenge for weapons, vehicles, and supplies to survive and eliminate your opponents.

features.name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate
features.smallDesc: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate is a crossover fighting game where you can play as various characters from different Nintendo franchises and other third-party games. You can battle against other players in multiplayer matches and enjoy a wide range of game modes.

features.name: World of Warcraft
features.smallDesc: World of Warcraft is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game set in the fantasy world of Azeroth. You can create a character from various races and classes, explore the vast world, complete quests, and engage in player versus player battles.

features.name: Halo Infinite
features.platform: PC, Xbox One, Xbox Series X
features.smallDesc: Halo Infinite is a first-person shooter game that continues the story of Master Chief as he faces off against the Banished on a mysterious Halo ring. You can experience the iconic gameplay of the Halo series with new weapons, vehicles, and multiplayer modes.

trending.name: Cyberpunk 2077
trending.platform: PC, PS4, Xbox One, PS5, Xbox Series X
trending.smallDesc: Cyberpunk 2077 is an open-world action role-playing game set in the futuristic Night City. You play as V, a mercenary outlaw, as you navigate the dangerous streets and make choices that shape the story and your character's abilities.

trending.name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
trending.platform: PC, PS4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
trending.smallDesc: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt is an open-world action role-playing game based on the fantasy novels by Andrzej Sapkowski. You play as Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter, as you embark on a quest to find your adopted daughter and uncover the secrets of the Wild Hunt.

list.name: Red Dead Redemption 2
list.smallDesc: Red Dead Redemption 2 is an open-world action-adventure game set in the Wild West. You play as Arthur Morgan, a member of the Van der Linde gang, as you navigate the harsh and unforgiving landscape, engage in gunfights, and make choices that shape the story.

list.name: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
list.platform: PC, PS4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
list.smallDesc: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim is an open-world action role-playing game set in the fantasy world of Tamriel. You play as the Dragonborn, a hero with the power to absorb dragon souls and use their abilities. Explore the vast world, complete quests, and customize your character.

list.name: Call of Duty: Warzone
list.smallDesc: Call of Duty: Warzone is a free-to-play battle royale game set in the Call of Duty universe. You can drop into a massive map, gather weapons and equipment, and fight against other players to be the last one standing. The game also features a Plunder mode where you collect cash to buy upgrades and respawn teammates.

list.name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
list.platform: PC, PS4, Xbox One, PS5, Xbox Series X
list.smallDesc: Assassin's Creed Valhalla is an open-world action role-playing game set in the Viking Age. You play as Eivor, a Viking raider, as you lead your clan to settle in England and wage war against the Anglo-Saxon kingdoms. Explore a beautiful and dynamic world, build your settlement, and engage in epic battles.

list.name: FIFA 22
list.platform: PC, PS4, Xbox One, PS5, Xbox Series X
list.smallDesc: FIFA 22 is a football simulation game that brings the excitement of the beautiful game to your screen. Play as your favorite teams and players, compete in various game modes, and experience realistic gameplay and stunning visuals.

list.name: Madden NFL 22
list.platform: PC, PS4, Xbox One, PS5, Xbox Series X
list.smallDesc: Madden NFL 22 is an American football simulation game that allows you to experience the thrill of the NFL. Play as your favorite teams and players, compete in realistic matches, and strategize your way to victory.

list.name: The Last of Us Part II
list.smallDesc: The Last of Us Part II is an action-adventure game set in a post-apocalyptic world. You play as Ellie, a young survivor, as you navigate dangerous environments, engage in intense combat, and make choices that impact the story. Experience a gripping narrative and stunning visuals in this highly acclaimed game.

list.name: Ghost of Tsushima
list.smallDesc: Ghost of Tsushima is an open-world action-adventure game set in feudal Japan. You play as Jin Sakai, a samurai warrior, as you fight against the Mongol invasion and protect your homeland. Explore a beautiful and immersive world, engage in epic sword fights, and embrace the way of the Ghost.

list.name: God of War
list.smallDesc: God of War is an action-adventure game that follows the journey of Kratos, a Spartan warrior, and his son Atreus. Together, they venture into the Norse realms, face powerful enemies, and uncover the truth about Kratos' past. Experience a compelling story, intense combat, and breathtaking visuals in this critically acclaimed game.

list.name: Marvel's Spider-Man: Miles Morales
list.smallDesc: Marvel's Spider-Man: Miles Morales is an action-adventure game that puts you in the shoes of Miles Morales, a young Spider-Man with unique powers. Swing through the streets of New York City, battle against supervillains, and embrace your role as a hero. Experience thrilling gameplay and a heartfelt story in this standalone adventure.

list.name: Horizon Zero Dawn
list.smallDesc: Horizon Zero Dawn is an action role-playing game set in a post-apocalyptic world where machines roam the earth. You play as Aloy, a skilled hunter, as you unravel the mysteries of the past and uncover your own destiny. Explore a stunning open world, engage in tactical combat, and discover the secrets of the Old Ones.
